H0.text: Pedalfer is the soil that is common in deciduous forests.

H1.text: Sandy soil is common in deciduous forests.

H2.text: Xerophyte is soil common in deciduous forests.

H3.text: Loam is the soil common in deciduous forests.

A4.text: The classic podzol horizon sequence, since podzols are strongly acidic: in these soils, a pale eluvial (E) horizon lies under the organic surface layer and overlies a dark B horizon.
